SELECT B.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_INTRODUCE, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE, MENTORING_CLICK, MENTORING_OPEN_DATE, MENTORING_KIND, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_REQUEST FROM MENTORING
UPPER(MENTORING_KIND) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{mentoring_kind}) || '%'
AND mentoring_begin_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{mentoring_begin_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{mentoring_end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND mentoring_end_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{mentoring_begin_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{mentoring_end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_INTRODUCE, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE, MENTORING_CLICK, MENTORING_OPEN_DATE, MENTORING_KIND, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_REQUEST, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1000, 10000) as rand FROM MENTORING ORDER BY RAND
SELECT * FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTORING ( MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_INTRODUCE, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE, MENTORING_KIND ) VALUES ( SEQ_MENTORING.NEXTVAL, #{mentoring_name}, #{mentoring_limit}, #{mentoring_introduce}, #{mentoring_content}, #{mentoring_photo}, #{mentoring_price}, #{mentor_id}, to_date(#{mentoring_begin_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date(#{mentoring_end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{mentoring_kind} )
mapper.select: SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_INTRODUCE, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as s_date, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as e_date, MENTORING_KIND FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTOR_ID = #{mentor_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTOR_ID = #{mentor_id}

SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_INTRODUCE, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as e_date, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as s_date, MENTORING_KIND FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER = #{mentoring_number}
SELECT * FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_KIND = #{mentoring_kind} ORDER BY MENTORING_NUMBER

SELECT I.MENTORING_NUMBER, I.MENTORING_NAME, I.MENTORING_LIMIT, I.MENTORING_CONTENT, I.MENTORING_PHOTO, I.MENTORING_PRICE, I.MENTORING_DATA, I.MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(I.MENTORING_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mentoring_end_date", TO_CHAR(I.MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mentoring_begin_date", M.ID FROM MENTORING I
JOIN MENTOR M ON I.MENTOR_ID=M.MENTOR_ID WHERE ID=#{id}
select MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE = #{mentoring_begin_date}

SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_begin_date", TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_end_date", MENTORING_CLICK, MENTORING_OPEN_DATE FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER = #{mentoring_number}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENTORING MENTORING, SHOPPING SHOPPING WHERE MENTORING.MENTORING_NUMBER = SHOPPING.MENTORING_NUMBER AND SHOPPING.ID = #{id}
